item.description:
Greetings newcomers group.

If anyone is in town during the Thanksgiving week and wants an opportunity to socialize, read on. If you are traveling home and need an excuse to return to Providence a day early, read on. Otherwise, we'll see you on the other side of T-day.

Several of us will be getting together informallly a few times this week. If you are around and want to join in, please rsvp and/or email me for my cell phone so you can find out where we are at the moment.

Here's a tentative itinerary:
Tuesday: Wing Night at the Abbey every week
it gets crowded and wings sometimes sell out. I might stop in for a drink around 8 or 9.

Wednesday:
8-10 Scurvy Dog, 1718 Westminster Street, http://scurvydogbar.c...
possible dj at some point while we are there, but not sure when it starts
10:30 - ? @201 Westminster where every Wednesday is "brit pop, indie, and 80's classics" so get your dance on with me and Edd!!!

Friday:
Avery and E&O over on the west side tucked into the neighborhood behind Julian's on Broadway.
Probably hit Avery first then walk to E&O, great neighborhood gems. Both close at midnight so maybe move on to Lily Marlene's on Atwells (a short drive) or Julian's (a quick walk might be better).

Saturday:
no plans yet, but who wants to get together? Maybe hit Wild Colonial or Snookers to play some pool or darts? Or Local 121 with a dj and dance floor after 11. Post a comment on this event meetup page for ideas.

I've been working lots of weekends lately so ready for some downtime and time out on the town without having to get up early the next day!!
Happy Thanksgiving everyone!
- val
item.name: Thanksgiving week - evening socializing opportunities
